AgencyMetadata.title: Upmerce Solutions | High-Performance Websites for Moroccan Tourism
AgencyMetadata.description: We build fast, secure, multi-theme websites for riads, tour operators, and guides in Morocco. Increase your direct bookings and escape commission fees.

StatsSection.title: Our Achievements & Standards
StatsSection.subtitle: We are committed to delivering exceptional quality and measurable results for every client.

AgencyTechnology.title: Our Technology Advantage
AgencyTechnology.subtitle: Discover the stark difference between outdated practices and Upmerce's cutting-edge approach to web development.

oldWay.title: The Old Way
oldWay.performance: Slow loading times and clunky interfaces.
oldWay.security: Vulnerable to cyber threats and data breaches.
oldWay.cost: High initial investment with hidden maintenance fees.

newWay.title: The Upmerce Way
newWay.performance: Blazing-fast performance and seamless user experience.
newWay.cost: Cost-effective solutions with predictable monthly pricing.

AgencyOwnership.title: Your Ownership, Our Priority
AgencyOwnership.subtitle: At Upmerce, we believe in transparency and empowering you with full control over your digital assets.
AgencyOwnership.item1: You own 100% of your website code and assets.
AgencyOwnership.item2: No hidden fees or restrictive contracts.
AgencyOwnership.item3: Full access to your hosting and domain settings.

FaqHub.title: Questions on Your Mind? We Have Answers.
FaqHub.subtitle: Explore our knowledge hub where we tackle the most common questions businesses like yours ask.

AgencyFounder.missionStatement: At Upmerce, our mission is to empower businesses with cutting-edge digital solutions that drive growth and foster meaningful connections. We believe in building more than just websites; we build partnerships for success.

Blog.authorBioShort: Digital Transformation Experts for Tourism in Morocco.
Blog.blogCtaTitle: Ready to Transform Your Tourism Business Online?
Blog.blogCtaDescription: Let Upmerce Solutions build a high-performance, conversion-driven website tailored for the Moroccan tourism market.

Onboarding.title: Website Project Questionnaire
Onboarding.introduction: This questionnaire will help us gather all the necessary information to build a professional website that perfectly represents your business and helps you achieve your goals. Please be as detailed as possible.
Onboarding.officialNameHelp: This is for legal and copyright purposes.
Onboarding.websiteDisplayNameHelp: The name that will prominently appear on your website header and branding.
Onboarding.sloganPlaceholder: e.g., Authentic, private trekking tours in the High Atlas Mountains, led by local Berber guides.
Onboarding.logoHelp: If yes, please upload it in a high-quality format (PNG, SVG).
Onboarding.sloganHelp: A catchy phrase that describes your business.
Onboarding.businessCategoryHelp: What type of business are you?
Onboarding.industrySpecificsHelp: Briefly describe your main services or products. E.g., 'Airport transfers, day trips to Ourika Valley, Sahara tours', or 'Handmade leather goods'.
Onboarding.industrySpecificsPlaceholder: e.g., Airport transfers, day trips to Ourika Valley, Sahara tours
Onboarding.primaryColorHelp: This is the main color for buttons, links, and key elements. If you know the hex code, that's perfect. If not, just describe it.
Onboarding.secondaryColorHelp: A second color to complement your primary one.
Onboarding.templateThemeHelp: Choose a theme that best reflects your brand's style. This will dictate the overall look and feel.
Onboarding.addressPlaceholder: Your main office or meeting point
Onboarding.whatsappNumberHelp: If you use WhatsApp for business communication, please provide the number.
Onboarding.aboutUsContentPlaceholder: Tell us your company story, mission, and values. This will be the content for your 'About Us' page.
Onboarding.aboutUsContentHelp: A brief overview of your company's history, mission, and what makes you unique.
Onboarding.serviceDescriptionPlaceholder: e.g., We offer private airport transfers, guided city tours in Marrakech, and multi-day desert excursions.
Onboarding.serviceDescriptionHelp: Provide a detailed description of the main services or types of tours you offer.
Onboarding.tourLocationsServedPlaceholder: e.g., Imlil & High Atlas, Marrakech Day Trips, Agafay Desert
Onboarding.tourLocationsServedHelp: List the primary cities, regions, or destinations where your tours operate, separated by commas.
Onboarding.paymentMethodsAcceptedHelp: Which payment methods do you accept from clients?
Onboarding.websiteLanguageOptionsHelp: Which languages should your website be available in?
Onboarding.keywordsPlaceholder: e.g., atlas mountains trek, morocco hiking, imlil guide (list 5-10 words/phrases customers search for)
Onboarding.keywordsHelp: Please list 5-10 words or phrases that customers would typically search on Google to find your business, separated by commas.
Onboarding.socialShareImageHelp: Provide one beautiful, high-quality photo that best represents your business. This image will appear when your website link is shared on social media.
Onboarding.reviewsSystemHelp: Allows guests to leave and display reviews directly on your site to build trust.
Onboarding.blogSystemHelp: A blog to share stories, updates, and attract more visitors from Google.
Onboarding.bookingEngineHelp: A form or system for customers to request or make reservations with specific dates and preferences.
Onboarding.experiencesSectionHelp: A structured section to showcase your specific tours, packages, or unique experiences.
Onboarding.faqSectionHelp: An organized section to answer common customer questions, reducing direct inquiries.
Onboarding.formSuccess: Thank you! Your questionnaire has been submitted successfully. We'll be in touch shortly!
Onboarding.formError: An error occurred. Please try again. If the problem persists, contact us directly.

businessBrandSection.title: Business & Brand Identity
businessBrandSection.description: Provide the core details of your business and brand. This information will be used across your website.

Onboarding.emailHelp: The primary email for customer inquiries.
Onboarding.phoneHelp: The main phone number for your business.
Onboarding.addressHelp: Your physical business location, if applicable.
Onboarding.facebookHelp: Link to your official Facebook page.
Onboarding.instagramHelp: Link to your official Instagram profile.
Onboarding.twitterHelp: Link to your official Twitter/X profile.
